header.title: Part 1
header.description: Utilize the provided Strapi API from the assessment to post user data into your Redux store. You are required to add one user into the 'users' collection and display this data in a table using a GET request. Ensure the implementation of Redux for state management, including both POST requests for adding a user and GET requests for displaying data in the table.

validations.firstNameTooShort: Name must be at least 3 characters.
validations.lastNameTooShort: Name must be at least 3 characters.
validations.phoneRequired: Phone number is required, must be at least 11 number
validations.phoneInvalid: Invalid phone format, must be at least 11 number

header.title: Part 2
header.description: Implement a map using any library of your choice (Leaflet is recommended). Search for the coordinates of 'Digifly Company' on Google Maps, then place a tooltip at these coordinates. Ensure that the tooltip styling matches the provided design below.

header.title: Part 3
header.description: Implement a text editor that precisely replicates the UI styles provided. It's essential to create the undo and redo functionalities from scratch, along with two additional features of your choice. You may use any package, but creating these functionalities from scratch will be advantageous. Ensure that all text editor functionalities are operational.

not-found.title: Not Found
not-found.message: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist.
